name: GeoSPARQL Topology: Simple Feature Properties
abstract: Properties which can be used to describe the topology of geometries using Simple Features relations

examples.title: sfEquals relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to itself using the geo:sfEquals relation.

examples.title: sfDisjoint relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to another feature using the geo:sfDisjoint relation.

examples.title: sfWithin and sfContains relation example
examples.content: A feature is related to another feature using the geo:sfWithin and geo:sfContains relations.

snippets.code:
{
  "type": "FeatureCollection",
  "features": [
    { "type": "Feature",
      "geometry": { "type": "Polygon",
      "coordinates": [[[-83.6,34.1], 
                    [-83.2, 34.1], [-83.2, 34.5], 
                    [-83.6, 34.5], [-83.6, 34.1]]]
        },
       "properties":{"rdfs:label":"AExactGeom",
                     "geo:coordinateDimension": 2 ,
                     "geo:dimension": 2 ,
                     "geo:isEmpty": false,
                     "geo:isSimple": true,
                     "geo:spatialDimension": 2 
                    }
    },    { "type": "Feature",
      "geometry": { "type": "Polygon",
      "coordinates": [[[-83.6,34.1], 
                    [-83.4, 34.1], [-83.4, 34.3], 
                    [-83.6, 34.3], [-83.6, 34.1]]]
        },
       "properties":{"rdfs:label":"BExactGeom",
                     "geo:coordinateDimension": 2 ,
                     "geo:dimension": 2 ,
                     "geo:isEmpty": false ,
                     "geo:isSimple": true ,
                     "geo:spatialDimension": 2 
                    }
    }, 
    { "type": "Feature",
      "geometry": { "type": "Point",
      "coordinates": [-83.5, 34.2]
        },
       "properties":{"rdfs:label":"BPointGeom",
                     "geo:coordinateDimension": 2 ,
                     "geo:isEmpty": false,
                     "geo:isSimple": true,
                     "geo:spatialDimension": 2 
                    }
    }  
  ]
}
